name: blue-prince-guide
description: Blue Prince Spoiler Free Guide & Tracking - Interactive checklist with progressive disclosure

scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build complete! Deploy the dist/ folder to your web server.'
scripts.debug: echo 'Setting debug mode...' && node -e "console.log('Add ?debug=true to URL or run: localStorage.setItem(\"debug\", \"true\")')"
scripts.analyze: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=['app.js','data.js','sections.js','checkboxes.js','information.js']; files.forEach(f => { if(fs.existsSync(f)) { const size = fs.statSync(f).size; console.log(f + ': ' + Math.round(size/1024) + 'KB'); } });"

author: Juvia Suisei
